name: ABSOLUTE GARBAGE: THE COLLECTION
description:
This is a collection of RPGmaker VX Ace games that were an inside joke that got out of hand. They may or may not also be teasers for a future game, but lets not get into that here.

Featuring:

  • Absolute Garbage 1(Original: September 2018, Remake: TBA
  • Absolute Garbage 2(Original: October 2018, Revamp: March 2019)
  • Absolute Garbage 3(Original: January 2019, Rebalance Update: TBA)
  • Absolute Garbage 4: The Final Meme(Original: May 2019, True End update: TBA)

I hope you enjoy this absolute dumpsterfire.

(BIG F**KING WARNING, contains: Extreme swearing, crack, memes, spooky skeletons, bastardizations of beloved copyrighted characters, enough copyright infringement to give a lawyer a heart attack, and lots of trash. )
